item.description:
FRIDAY JUNE 11, 2010
9PM - 2AM

THE GREATEST BAR
4 FLOORS - 2 DJS - 2 SOUNDS - MARTINI LOUNGE

Dyke Night Productions found a bigger, bustier venue to host this yearâ€™s Official After-Party for the Boston Dyke March. The Dyke March brings together thousands of women for a rally on Boston Common. Within walking distance of the Common, stroll over to The Greatest Bar directly after the march (we open early) and order from their full menu of dinner and appetizers.

FEATURING
DJ KELVIN
DJ KRIS KONO

The Greatest Bar features four floors, four bars, and 3 distinctive sounds.

DJ Kelvin spins old school, hip hop and international music on the 4th floor,

DJ Kris Kono spins dance /pop on 1st and 2nd floors

and if you are not in the dancing mood-
the 3rd floor Martini Lounge is the perfect place to relax after the rally, catch up with friends, or chill with someone new.

Just a short walk from the Boston Common, or conveniently located
across from the North Station MBTA stop.

Supporting this event supports the Dyke March as Dyke Night is a proud
funder of the Dyke March.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Dyke Night After Party - Official After Party of the Boston Dyke March
